verses.verse: On that night<WH3915> could not<WH5074> the king<WH4428> sleep<WH8142>, and he commanded<WH559> to bring<WH935> the book<WH5612> of records<WH2146> of the chronicles<WH1697>; and they were read<WH7121> before<WH6440> the king<WH4428>.

And Haman<WH2001> answered<WH559> the king<WH4428>, For the man<WH376> whom the king<WH4428> delights<WH2654> to honor<WH3366>,
